issue.title: [Rust] Write statistics to Parquet files
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9280](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9280). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Calculate page and columns statistics in Parquet files.

Support providing precalculated statistics for batches of values (useful when converting from other formats like ORC)

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9280?focusedCommentId=17150646) by Chao Sun (csun):*
Issue resolved by pull request 7622
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7622>
